subject: Bet: Win with your special invitation
body:
BetZip: Play Poker without Neteller

Bet,
You don't need to jump through hoops to play poker for cash prizes. BetZip is the only site that accepts US based credit cards.








You could be the next big winner! Join the Player's Club now.

No purchase necessary. See terms and conditions.
